I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie, like going to the theater and watching it. With movies you can watch in your house,I fall asleep all the time.

If any one wants to know what NOT to do at a real movie - get up and go to work then come back in middle of another show without waiting.

While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, Jerry MEA Culpa puts Tom into a ball ornament after getting busy with his new sweetheart. Tom picks it up thinking that Jerry had left him something to play with.
Tad Sometimes cut into films with a "Merry Snow" prefix for Christmas distribution

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back and reminds me of your childhood and some incredible work by its writers. If I think about a good cover version of Brother Louie or This Is Pop ‘Lonely Girl’ as well as the re-arrangement of Breakfast In Vegas comes back to my mind always.

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the countless empires that make up the Hunting Worlds.
